data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Anseba, Eritrea.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Anseba, Eritrea
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Anseba that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Anseba, Eritrea to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Anseba, Eritrea with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Beja, Bedawi people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 369,508 cultural Christians in the state of Anseba to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Anseba.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary:
the state of Anseba, Eritrea has a population of 766,500.

We estimate Anseba has 20,285 people who might know Jesus, 369,508 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 376,707 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 37 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Anseba, Eritrea. Please, stir the 20,285 believers here to pray for awakening.

location.name: Anseba
location.people_groups_list: Deaf, Arab, Palestinian, Saho, Irob, Nara, Dahalik
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Deaf (26,000), Arab, Palestinian (15,000), Saho, Irob (130,000), Nara (55,000), Dahalik (1,100)
